name: Mojo: Hanako
description: "Mojo: Hanako” is a new version of the famous game “2048”, an original approach to this well-known puzzle. Beautiful Hanako will keep you company during the game. The more points you get, the less clothes remain on the girl.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 Процессор: 1000 MHz Оперативная память: 1024 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Hardware support WebGL - OpenGL 2.1 (GPU Memory - 512MB) Место на диске: 125 MB
